org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary

Class MapillaryMouseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.MapillaryMouseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MapillaryMouseAdapter
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    Handles the input event related with the layer. Mainly clicks.

    nokutu
